parametersDescriptions.disabled: If true, the tab will be disabled.
parametersDescriptions.id:
The id of the tab.
If not provided, it will be automatically generated.
parametersDescriptions.onChange: If true, the tab will be disabled.
parametersDescriptions.onClick: Callback fired when the tab is clicked.
parametersDescriptions.ref: Ref to the DOM element associated with the tab.
parametersDescriptions.value:
The value of the tab.
It's used to associate the tab with a tab panel(s) with the same value.
If the value is not provided, it falls back to the position index.

returnValueDescriptions.active: If true, the tab is active (as in :active pseudo-class; in other words, pressed).
returnValueDescriptions.focusVisible: If true, the tab has visible focus. This is a workaround for browsers that do not support this feature natively.
returnValueDescriptions.getRootProps: Resolver for the root slot's props.
returnValueDescriptions.index: 0-based index of the tab in the list of tabs.
returnValueDescriptions.setFocusVisible:
Sets the focus-visible state of the tab.
This is a workaround for browsers that do not support this feature natively.
returnValueDescriptions.totalTabsCount:
Total number of tabs in the nearest parent TabsList.
This can be used to determine if the tab is the last one to style it accordingly.
